author: Ramesh Susarla
title: Production at KIA Motors India plant comes to a halt after lockdown orders
description: Only essential services and procedures that cannot be stopped are being run with skeleton staff
content: Following lockdown orders issued by the State government in view of the COVID19, production in KIA Motors India cars manufacturing unit came to a standstill on Monday. Only the essential services/procedures that cannot be stopped are being run with skeleton s… [+994 chars]
